org.fit.cssbox.css
Class AttributeSpec

java.lang.Object
  org.fit.cssbox.css.AttributeSpec

public class AttributeSpec
extends java.lang.Object

A specification of a required value of an attribute according to a selector specification. It specifies the attribute name, its required value and the way the required value is compared with the actual value.

Author:
radek
